title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.52 - Transport vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.52 - Transport vehicles

State Regulations

Spaces used to carry food in transport vehicles are to be maintained in a sanitary condition to protect food from contamination. Spaces used for food are to be separate from spaces used to carry sanitizing and maintenance chemicals and supplies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
